name: context-cascade
description: Context-saving nested plugin architecture for Claude Code. Playbooks -> Skills -> Agents -> Commands. Load only what you need - 90%+ context savings with 217 agents, 171 skills, 7 playbooks, 245 commands (640 total components).

plugins.name: 12fa-core
plugins.description: Essential 12-Factor Agent tools: SPARC methodology, core agents (coder/reviewer/tester/planner/researcher), audit pipeline, and quality gates

plugins.name: 12fa-three-loop
plugins.description: Advanced Three-Loop Architecture: Loop 1 (Research-Driven Planning with 5x pre-mortem), Loop 2 (Parallel Swarm Implementation), Loop 3 (CI/CD Intelligent Recovery)

plugins.name: 12fa-security
plugins.description: Enterprise security infrastructure: Agent Spec Generator CLI, Policy DSL Engine, Guardrail Enforcement, Agent Registry, Secrets Management, OpenTelemetry

plugins.name: 12fa-visual-docs
plugins.description: Complete Graphviz workflow diagrams: 271 AI-comprehensible visualizations (73 skills, 104 agents, 94 commands) with validation tools and interactive HTML viewer

plugins.name: 12fa-swarm
plugins.description: Multi-agent swarm systems: Hierarchical/Mesh/Adaptive topologies, Byzantine consensus, Hive Mind coordination, CRDT synchronization, Queen Seraphina orchestrator
